Paper published from JGR-Solid Earth

Title: Sub-Decadal Volcanic Tsunamis Due To Submarine Trapdoor Faulting at Sumisu Caldera in the Izu–Bonin Arc Authors: Osamu Sandanbata, Shingo Watada, Kenji Satake, Hiroo Kanamori, Luis Rivera, and Zhongwen Zhan

Link: Journal of Geophysical Research – Solid Earth.
